content: you how to make a rectangular shaped mat comprising solely of the training wheels motif it will give you a good initiation into the world of breakaway crochet and since you will be making 130 training wheels it will provide you with plenty of practice making floating double crochets hint this actually makes a very practical and attractive placemat so if you want this project to be for keeps i suggest you use a durable washable yarn such as cotton or linen 14 materials yarn thorobred 4ply 100% cotton mercerized 2 balls hook size d 3 25 mm abbreviations and symbols to be consistent with future breakaway crochet projects extensive use of stitch diagrams will be featured floating double_crochet fdc double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch indicates first stitch to work in diagram indicates direction of work project information the finished rectangle will be 13 tws wide by 10 tws high if a different size piece is required astute crocheters will readily see how the dimensions of this project can be modified gauge is not critical but each training wheel measures approximately 1 1/8 finished mat size is approximately 16 x 11 15 instructions this pattern uses 4 stitch diagrams you need only work the symbols that are colored red or black any gray symbols represent previous stitches and are included in the diagram to help you keep track of where you are step 1 work diagram 1 13 times step 2 work diagram 2 step 3 work diagram 3 16 step 4 as for step 2 step 5 now it s time to finish off all the tw s on the left-hand edge as is shown in diagram 4 fasten_off training complete final words i hope by now you are realizing how transformative breakaway crochet can be with the invention of the floating ring it is now possible to sidestep many of the tedious jobs that make working projects with many small motifs such an unattractive undertaking even more mind-blowing is that with just a slight modification of the floating ring technique it is possible to make many more types of stiches and therefore other types of motifs and with that in mind the good news is that i have designed many more breakaway crochet projects ranging from simple mats and scarves to the more challenging projects such as bags and lacy shawls i hope you will stay in touch as new designs become available now that i have revealed my invention of breakaway crochet i very much look forward to see how all this takes off i hope you will enjoy using this new tool in you toolbox may your crocheting spirit be inspired 17
